businessmodel

Class VehicleModelSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • businessmodel.VehicleModelSpecification

  • public class VehicleModelSpecification
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a car model specification. It gives an overview of lists of options that are available for a car model.
    Author:
    SWOP Team 10

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VehicleModelSpecification(java.util.ArrayList<VehicleOption> options)
      Creates a new car model specification with a given list of options.

    • Method Summary

      Checks whether the restrictions for a car are satisfied.
      java.util.ArrayList<VehicleOption> getOptionsClone()
      Returns a cloned object of the list of options of the car model specification.
      java.util.ArrayList<VehicleOption> getOptionsOfCategory(VehicleOptionCategory category)
      Returns a list of options with a given category of the car model specification.

      • checkRestrictions

        public boolean checkRestrictions(Vehicle car)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                 UnsatisfiedRestrictionException
        Checks whether the restrictions for a car are satisfied.
        Parameters:
        car - The car that needs to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the car doesn't violate any restrictions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - | If the car is equal to 'null' | car == null
        UnsatisfiedRestrictionException - | If the car violates any of of the restrictions.
